"Service is excellent always with a beautiful sparkling pool." "Steve and Nicole are exceptionally knowledgeable, fair and professional people." "Their rates are reasonable but I wouldn't switch anyway."

Direct Pool has been with us for quite a while. Service is excellent always with a beautiful sparkling pool. Steve is aways available for any repairs and Nicole and Seth keep things running. I highly recommend them. More

Have been a client for about 5 years and Nicole & Seth has been a perfect team ,  providing exceptional service from cleaning to fixing spots & stains in pool to pumps repairs when needed. Always punctual & courteous More

We want to express our sincere appreciation for the excellent service provided by Steve, Nicole and their excellent staff at Direct Pools. Despite our pool’s age, they show up every week with dedication and professionalism.
